alert.note: Alert for Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 22 at 7:54AM CST until January 27 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Calcasieu River Near Glenmora For the Bayou Des Cannes...including Eunice...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Calcasieu River...including Glenmora...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 900 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River near Glenmora. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, When the river is rising and the gauge reading is forecast to reach 12 feet or higher. Roads upstream from Glenmora, including Strothers Crossing Road near the community of Calcasieu and Price Crossing Road near Hineston have water on them and are subject to being closed. Also, flooding of forested areas near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM CST Monday the stage was 5.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Thursday morning to a crest of 12.5 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Calcasieu River Glenmora 12.0 5.2 Mon 6 am CST 6.2 9.5 11.9 &&
